Query:
SELECT
				     sctl.ID,
					 et1.EnumValue,
					 ct.NotificationCode,
				     DATE_FORMAT(sctl.CreateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 DATE_FORMAT(sctl.LastUpdateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 tt.TransactionName,
					 sctl.DestMDN,
					 destpkTemp.Description,
					 et2.EnumValue,
					 round(sctl.TransactionAmount-sctl.CalculatedCharge, 2),
				     round(sctl.CalculatedCharge, 2),
				     round(sctl.TransactionAmount, 2),
				     ct.BankCode,
				     ct.BankSystemTraceAuditNumber,
				     ct.BankRetrievalReferenceNumber,
				     sctl.ChannelCodeID,
				     sctl.Info1,
				     integration_summary.IntegrationType,
				     integration_summary.ReconcilationID1,
				     integration_summary.ReconcilationID2,
				     integration_summary.ReconcilationID3,
				     (SELECT IFNULL((SELECT ipm.IntegrationName FROM integration_partner_map ipm where ipm.InstitutionID = integration_summary.InstitutionID) ,'Others'))   
				FROM
				     enum_text et1,enum_text et2,commodity_transfer ct INNER JOIN pocket srcPocket ON ct.SourcePocketID = srcPocket.ID
					 INNER JOIN pocket destPocket ON ct.DestPocketID = destPocket.ID
				     INNER JOIN service_charge_txn_log sctl ON ct.ID = sctl.CommodityTransferID
				     INNER JOIN transaction_type tt ON tt.ID= sctl.TransactionTypeID
					 LEFT OUTER JOIN integration_summary ON sctl.ID = integration_summary.SctlId
					 INNER JOIN pocket_template destpkTemp ON destpkTemp.ID = destPocket.PocketTemplateId
				WHERE
					 sctl.TransactionTypeID IN (select ID from transaction_type where transaction_type.TransactionName like '%Cashin')
				     AND sctl.TransactionTypeID= tt.ID
					 AND et1.TagID=6089 AND sctl.status=et1.EnumCode
					 AND et2.TagID=5051 AND destPocket.status=et2.EnumCode
					 AND sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					 AND sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
					 AND sctl.status like ${TransactionStatus} 
				ORDER BY
				     sctl.CreateTime ASC
